CFT.Enabled.name: Enable follow camera
CFT.Enabled.hint: Keeps your camera smoothly centered on your controlled token(s). Default hotkey: Alt+F (configurable in Keybindings) or use the crosshair icon.
CFT.RetainZoom.name: Retain zoom level
CFT.RetainZoom.hint: If enabled, your current zoom level is preserved while following.
CFT.Scale.name: Target zoom (if not retaining)
CFT.Scale.hint: Only used when 'Retain zoom level' is off.
CFT.Responsiveness.name: Responsiveness (0.05–0.5)
CFT.Responsiveness.hint: How much of the remaining distance the camera moves each frame. 0.5 = snappier, 0.1 = smoother.
CFT.MaxSpeed.name: Maximum speed (px/s)
CFT.MaxSpeed.hint: Optional cap for camera panning speed. 0 = unlimited.
CFT.IdleMs.name: Idle settle (ms)
CFT.IdleMs.hint: Time to wait after tokens stop moving before considering the camera idle.
CFT.ResumeOnRelease.name: Resume follow after mouse release
CFT.ResumeOnRelease.hint: When enabled and idle, after you stop panning with the mouse, the camera recenters on your controlled tokens and resumes following.
CFT.Toggle.name: Toggle follow camera
CFT.Force.name: Force Follow (GM only)
CFT.Force.hint: When enabled by the GM, all players are locked to follow their own selected tokens. Players cannot toggle follow until released.
CFT.Force.enabledGM: Force Follow enabled — all players are now locked to follow.
CFT.Force.disabledGM: Force Follow disabled — players can control follow again.
CFT.Force.enabledPlayer: The GM has locked camera follow. You cannot disable it.
CFT.Force.disabledPlayer: The GM has released the lock. You may control camera follow.
CFT.Force.lockedPlayer: Camera follow is locked by the GM.
CFT.Cinematic.name: Cinematic Lock (GM only)
CFT.Cinematic.hint: All clients focus on the GM's selected token(s). Players cannot move their tokens. Restores everyone when disabled.
CFT.Cinematic.enabledGM: Cinematic Lock enabled — all clients now follow your selection.
CFT.Cinematic.disabledGM: Cinematic Lock disabled — clients restored to prior state.
CFT.Cinematic.enabledPlayer: Cinematic mode enabled by the GM. Controls are temporarily restricted.
CFT.Cinematic.disabledPlayer: Cinematic mode disabled. Your previous camera state was restored.
